scripts.build-data: pnpm run lint && pnpm run --filter scraper generate-website-data && next build
scripts.build-and-push: pnpm run build-data && git diff --quiet --exit-code packages/website/investigation/giveaway_leavers.json || (git add packages/website/investigation/giveaway_leavers.json && git commit -m 'chore: updated investigation file' && git push)
